document_data.mainbody:
ord Yeschant was an inhabitant of Cormanthyr in the 3 century DR.
Lord Yeschant participated a covert meeting with the people of other houses, conspiring against Coronal Eltargrim, on  after the hunting of Elminster Aumar. He named the death of his son, who had participated in the hunt for Elminster, as a reason for his participation.
